title: Definitions
context: [ยง431:21-102] Definitions. As used in the article: &ldquo;Association&rdquo; means the Hawaii Property Insurance Association created under section 431:21-103. &ldquo;Basic property insurance&rdquo; means insurance against direct loss to real or tangible personal property from perils insured under the standard fire policy and extended coverage endorsement. &ldquo;Member insurer&rdquo; means any person who is authorized to transact property or casualty insurance in this State and is not engaged only in writing motor vehicle insurance under section 431:10C-106. &ldquo;Net direct written premiums&rdquo; means the premiums taxable pursuant to section 431:7-202(a) for policies of property and casualty insurance. [L 1991, c 284, pt of ยง2]
